class wfloader.models.Wikifolio(*args, **kwargs)¶

Basic Wikifolio as created by :model:`wfloader.Investor`.

get_meta()¶

Initializes :model:`wfloader.Wikifolio` to retrieve all infos which are on the Wikifolio page e.g. http://www.wikifolio.com/de/de/wikifolio/aktien-deutschland-02.
